text_block_list.text: On a day off, while I was out shopping, I happened to see Tamamo Cross. She was just standing there, spacing out.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: !! T-t-t-…Traineeeeer!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yer here! Yer reeeeally here, thanks!! I've reeeeeally been hopin' you'd show up!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Tha's fine! Ya see, I'm jus' really strugglin' with this on my own!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ya see, I've never been in one 'a these fancy stores ta buy anything before, right? I don' even know where ta enter, and th' sun'll be settin' by the time I do!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I beg of ya! Can ya help me find a present fer my parents' weddin' anniversary?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: -and, it sounds like th' brats are gonna make some okonomiyaki ta celebrate. Since I can't help 'em, I thought it'd be better ta buy somethin' and send it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: With my budget, I can't really send 'em anything too pricey but… got any good ideas?
She just said something about this being fancy but, these stores were normally reasonable for a student's budget. If that's expensive to her-
choice_data_list: How about some really good snacks?
How about some really good snacks?

text_block_list.text: There are plenty of snacks that are low budget but look extravagant. They tend to be happily given away at gift exchanges, so maybe it'll feel a bit celebratory.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Looks fancy but is a decent price? Sounds great! And if it's snacks, th' brats can enjoy 'em too… Yeah, let's do that!
And with that, we ended up in a place that sells sweets, but-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: N-no way… isn't tha' one digit too many…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wha-… this… this 1 piece costs more than 5 boxes of chocolate!?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: One month's worth of allowance, gone in one bite… tha's insane!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Unbelievable… inconceivable… do people normally eat somethin' this expensive…?
I explain that they're normally used as gifts and not something for everyday. High-class sweets are special, so maybe as a way to reward yourself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A reward fer yerself…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I've heard 'bout tha' before, but people actually do that? Eh, isn't tha' wasteful? They don't save it? So weird…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But, really, this price… now I seriously have no idea what ta get…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …yeah. I wanna calm down a bit an' think about it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Fuuuuuu… I can finally take a breather. Okay, what should I order~.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …pancakes are THIS much?! I still need ta buy a present, so I'd rather spend it on that.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah-, I'm fine with jus' water! I'm not tha' hungry anyways~.

text_block_list.name: Cafe Employee
text_block_list.text: Pardon me. Have you decided on your order?

text_block_list.name: Cafe Employee
text_block_list.text: Two orders of pancakes and juice. Certainly.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wait! Why are ya orderin' for me?!
choice_data_list: A reward for you and me
A reward for you and me

text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross and I have been working hard day in and day out. I tell her they're a reward for me too, and she should join me.
Besides, it's not just for this spring. Hopefully she'll eat this and get the motiviation to work even harder moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …I can guess what yer thinkin'. Ya want me ta try out this "rewardin' yerself" thing fer myself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Since I can't really grasp what rewardin' yerself means… I ain't gotta reason ta refuse then. I'll try it fer myself!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Fuu Fuu Fuu… gettin' ta enjoy such expensive pancakes for free, today's my lucky day!

text_block_list.name: Cafe Employee
text_block_list.text: Sorry for the wait, pancakes and juice. Please take your time~.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's here!…it's really fluffy isn't it? So how is it…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …Fuaa!?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (The moment I put it in my mouth, it melted an' th' flavor of eggs spread all through my mouth… and it was gone in an instant…)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (The salty taste of th' butter goes real well with th' cream… and such a light aftertaste… I could eat these foreeeeeever…!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: SOOOO GOOD!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Trainer, these… are amazin'!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …fer sure, I'd want ta eat this again. I think I see why ya'd want ta stretch yer budget for somethin' like this!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …so tha's why it's called "rewardin' yerself"…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …But, I want my family to eat somethin' like this too. I want ta reward my parents and th' brats, too.
choice_data_list: I'm sure they feel the same way

text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross' family, probably want to treat her to something tasty like this too, feeling like it would be a reward for working so hard.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: My family wanting ta reward me… …now that I think about it-

text_block_list.name: Tamamo's Little Brother
text_block_list.text: Ah-! Neene is the only one with 1 extra croquette! Why-?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross' Father
text_block_list.text: Tha's Tama's reward! 'Cuz she won first place! Tama, eat up so ya can run well in th' next one too!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Tha's right… I've gotten rewarded before…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: My family and me feel th' same… it's so obvious ain't it? Not good… I was gettin' tunnel vision again…
choice_data_list: Every now and then, how about spoiling yourself?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …I've been spoiled more than enough… but I'll think about it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …well then. Gonna have some more of these pancakes! Don't wanna leave any leftovers of somethin' this tasty!
After saying that, Tamamo Cross continued stuffing herself with the pancakes with surprising vigor, saying how tasty it was the whole time.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I wanna finish it!! I wanna savor it! But, my limit… my limit is already approachin'…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …I think I'm cappin' out on this unfamiliar luxury… now, my back is covered in cold sweat… I'm feelin' faint…
-I never thought her tolerance for high-class food would be this low. But, even while in a cold sweat, she continued to stuff her mouth with pancake.
